atk-abh03a44:2_1: Idāni teyeva mūlayamake desite kusalādidhamme saccavasena saṅgaṇhitvā dhātuyamakānantaraṁ desitassa saccayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a44:2_2: Tatthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṇṇattivārādayo tayo mahāvārā antaravārādayo ca avasesappabhedā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:2_3: Paṇṇattivāre panettha catunnaṁ saccānaṁ vasena padasodhanavāro, padasodhanamūlacakkavāro, suddhasaccavāro,
atk-abh03a44:2_4: suddhasaccamūlacakkavāroti imesu catūsu vāresu yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:3_1: Paṇṇattivāraniddese pana avasesaṁ dukkhasaccanti dukkhavedanāya ceva taṇhāya ca vinimuttā tebhūmakadhammā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:3_2: Avaseso samudayoti saccavibhaṅge niddiṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalādibhedo dukkhasaccassa paccayo.
atk-abh03a44:3_4: Avaseso maggoti ‘‘tasmiṁ kho pana samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti, aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, micchāmaggo, jaṅghamaggo, sakaṭamaggo’’ti evamādiko.
atk-abh03a44:6_1: Pavattivāre panettha paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye ‘‘yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a44:6_4: tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatī’’ti dukkhasaccamūlakehi tīhi, samudayasaccamūlakehi dvīhi,
atk-abh03a44:6_5: nirodhasaccamūlakena ekenāti labbhamānañca alabbhamānañca gahetvā pāḷivasena chahi yamakehi bhavitabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:6_6: Tesu yasmā nirodhassa neva uppādo, na nirodho yujjati,
atk-abh03a44:6_8: samudayasaccamūlakaṁ maggasaccena saddhiṁ ekanti tīṇi yamakāni āgatāni.
atk-abh03a44:6_10: Evamettha sabbavāresu tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ yamakānaṁ vasena yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:6_11: Atthavinicchaye panettha idaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ – imassa hi saccayamakassa pavattivāre nirodhasaccaṁ tāva na labbhateva.
atk-abh03a44:6_12: Sesesu pana tīsu samudayasaccamaggasaccāni ekantena pavattiyaṁyeva labbhanti.
atk-abh03a44:6_14: Paccuppannādayo pana tayo kālā cutipaṭisandhīnampi pavattiyāpi vasena labbhanti. Evamettha yaṁ yaṁ labbhati,
atk-abh03a44:7_0: Tatridaṁ nayamukhaṁ – sabbesaṁ upapajjantānanti antamaso suddhāvāsānampi.
atk-abh03a44:7_2: Taṇhāvippayuttacittassāti idaṁ dukkhasaccasamudayasaccesu ekakoṭṭhāsassa uppattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:7_4: Catuvokāre pana taṇhāvippayuttassa phalasamāpatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe ekampi saccaṁ nuppajjati. Idaṁ idha na gahetabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:7_5: Tesaṁ dukkhasaccañcāti tasmiñhi khaṇe taṇhaṁ ṭhapetvā sesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nāma hotīti sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:7_9: Teneva kāraṇena ‘‘arūpe maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a44:7_10: no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatī’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:7_11: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tatthāti tesaṁ tasmiṁ upapattikkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇe cāti evamettha khaṇavasena okāso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a44:10_3: Yasmā ca lokuttaradhammesu pariññā nāma natthi;
atk-abh03a44:10_7: Iti imāsaṁ pariññānaṁ vasena sabbapadesu attho veditabboti.
